name: Aston may Die.
description:
Esthiru, a 24-year-old truck driver is waiting for their friend Aston to arrive so they can play fighting games. But what waits for them is more than that.

Aston may Die is a piece of yuri interactive fiction about being in love with someone that is dying and about not carrying about that, live in the moment. Makes some happy memories and forget the sad things that happened.

Aston may Die, sure, but who really isn't?

Content warnings are in the game's start screen, don't like it, don't read it.
An update that will add art to the game is coming.
